channel.title: CVE Feed for espressif -- arduino-esp32
channel.description: The latest CVEs for espressif -- arduino-esp32

item.title: CVE-2024-45798|2024-09-18T13:29:01.480Z -- espressif -- arduino-esp32
item.description: arduino-esp32 is an Arduino core for the ESP32, ESP32-S2, ESP32-S3, ESP32-C3, ESP32-C6 and ESP32-H2 microcontrollers. The `arduino-esp32` CI is vulnerable to multiple Poisoned Pipeline Execution (PPE) vulnerabilities. Code injection in `tests_results.yml` workflow (`GHSL-2024-169`) and environment Variable injection (`GHSL-2024-170`). These issue have been addressed but users are advised to verify the contents of the downloaded artifacts.
